Package eu.monnetproject.translation.langmodels

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Counter
    A method for counting the n-gram frequencies in the string
    NGramCountSet
    A set of n-gram count sets, i.e., the set of 1-grams, 2-grams, 3-grams etc.
    WeightedCounter  
    WeightedNGramCountSet  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlphaSigmaGrid  
    ExhaustiveCounter
    The obvious method for counting: never throw away anything, never make an error.
    FilterLMbyLM
    Script used to filter one LM by the n-grams occuring in another...
    LossyCounter
    Count using the lossy counting method.
    LossyWeightedCounter
    As with lossy counter but counts with a different weight for each element
    NGram
    Really just an int array, but has a proper hashCode() and equals()
    NGramCarousel
    This implements a data structure by which all NGrams can be quickly formed.
    NGramCountSetImpl
    Std NGram count set (implemented by Array of HashMaps)
    Object2IntAsDoubleMap<E>  
    Perplexity  
    StickySamplingCounter
    Count using the sticky sampling method.
    WeightedNGramCountSetImpl
